timeline.message: fix rewrite for derived orderBy projection

timeline.bodyText: The code's cyclomatic complexity is pretty high, it is better to extract serval private method for nested loop and if statement
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: The return value should be newColumnOrderByItem
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: String with + is not good practice, it is better to replace to String.format or StringBuilder
timeline.author: terrymanu

replies.bodyText: Ok, i change it to String.format.
replies.author: jingshanglu

timeline.bodyText: The object Map<RouteUnit, Collection> it too hard to understand, can you consider about to create a new object to describe it?
timeline.author: terrymanu

replies.bodyText: The struct just a result for all RouteUnit, different routeUnit correspond to different rewrited projection, if create a new object,it maybe a little heavy.
replies.author: jingshanglu

replies.bodyText:
t too hard to understand, what is the Collection?
It is better to make the code for read easier.
replies.author: terrymanu

replies.bodyText: The original struct is Collection<String> projections,it's a list of rewrited derived projection string,such as generate from order by, how about add some comments?
replies.author: jingshanglu

timeline.bodyText: what mean of realProjection? For my understanding, derived projection do not have real projection, can you rename it as correct name?
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: Util class should be final and static
timeline.author: terrymanu

replies.bodyText: This util have state,can not call it directly by classname.
replies.author: jingshanglu

replies.bodyText: It is invalid if util class has state, please consider change class name
replies.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: How about to avoid using + with string
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: original projection maybe a better name
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: Please rename variable name utils because of there is no any relationship with variable name and class type.
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText:
Is the class TableExtractor suitable in util package?
if it is not an util class, please move it to correct package.
timeline.author: terrymanu

replies.bodyText: I think it is just a util class with status, what package do you think is more appropriate?
replies.author: jingshanglu

replies.bodyText: maybe extractor is a better name
replies.author: terrymanu
